medical_history.chief_complaint: Severe osteoporosis and corneal transparency issues.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patient presented with symptoms including severe osteoporosis, scoliosis of approximately 20 degrees, and hyperextensibility of the joints. The visual acuity deterioration and other symptoms were evaluated over a two-year follow-up period, during which there was no significant decrease in the patient's best-corrected visual acuity or corneal characteristics.
medical_history.past_medical_history: The patient's parents, siblings, and two sons all underwent tests, which showed no abnormal findings.
medical_history.family_history: The patient was born to parents of fourth-degree consanguineous marriage. Not specified family medical conditions.
